articles.author: By PHILLIP B. WILSON Associated Press
articles.title: Herro leads balanced Heat effort in 122-108 rout of Pacers
articles.description: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) — Tyler Herro had 19 points, Duncan Robinson scored 11 of his 17 points in a decisive third quarter and seven Miami players scored in double figures as the Heat routed the Indiana Pacers 122-108 on Wednesday night.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS (AP) Tyler Herro had 19 points, Duncan Robinson scored 11 of his 17 points in a decisive third quarter and seven Miami players scored in double figures as the Heat routed the Indiana Pacers 122-108 on Wednesday night.

articles.title: Davis scores 20 to carry Navy over Bucknell 60-56
articles.description: LEWISBURG, Pa. (AP) — Cam Davis had 20 points as Navy narrowly defeated Bucknell 60-56 on Wednesday night.
articles.content:
LEWISBURG, Pa. (AP) Cam Davis had 20 points as Navy narrowly defeated Bucknell 60-56 on Wednesday night.

articles.title: Baby dies after being put in backpack; Texas man charged
articles.description: LUBBOCK, Texas (AP) — A West Texas man accused of putting his girlfriend's 10-month-old daughter in a backpack and leaving her in a car trunk for five hours was charged Wednesday with capital murder.

articles.title: Figures show road fatalities in Vermont went down in 2019
articles.description: MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP) — The number of fatalities on the Vermont roadways went down by about 30% in 2019, according to state figures.
articles.content:
